text: Michael Hanley O'Keefe Sr. (December 1, 1931 â€“ January 31, 2021) was an American lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Louisiana State Senate for Orleans Parish from 1960 to 1983. He was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. He was a member of the Democratic Party. O'Keefe died of melanoma on January 31, 2021, in Lakeview, Louisiana at age 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from New Orleans Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from melanoma Category:Lawyers from New Orleans
title: Michael O'Keefe (Louisiana politician)
